text: Prior to the expiration of a license, the Mayor shall mail a renewal notice to the licensee that includes:
historical:
Prior Codifications

1981 Ed., ยง 33-1005.

Legislative History of Laws

For legislative history of D.C. Law 8-137, see Historical and Statutory Notes following ยง 48-701.

DC CODE ยง 48-705

Current through December 11, 2012

sections.text: The expiration date of the current license;
The date by which the renewal application must be received by the Mayor in order for the renewal license to be issued and mailed to the licensee before the licensee's current license expires;
The amount of the renewal fee; and
Any other information the Mayor deems appropriate or necessary to renew the license.

chapter.text: Drug Manufacture and Distribution Licensure. (Refs & Annos)
